entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH, Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:09 p.m. PDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 11.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 9:00 PM PDT Friday 5 May 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 11.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of severe thunderstorms this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Low 6. Forecast issued 7:24 PM PDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Showers beginning in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 7:24 PM PDT Friday 5 May 2023
